casebody.head_matter:
Rotenbury Estate.
Argued January 13, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, ■ O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Mandarino, JJ.
Vincent J. Dopho, Deputy Attorney General, with him Richard N. Spare, Special Assistant Attorney General, and J. Shane Creamer, Attorney General, for Commonwealth, appellant.
No oral argument was made nor brief submitted for appellee.
April 20, 1972:
